title: Where can I download free music? - Quora

response.answer_text: The reason that 66 people answered your question is because, of course, there is no place on the internet where you can download free music. So what’s your next question? Getting back to my original sentence, I don’t feel that music is “free” unless you do not have to provide attribution, you can use it for commercial purposes, you can break up individual songs and use just parts of them, the music is also royalty-free, and you can even resell the music in any form you like. It’s not even worth looking for “free” music on the internet. It doesn’t exist.

Follow as many bands as you can.  Fill in their questionnaires, go to their gigs, support them in any way you can, even if that doesn't mean money. Make sure the bands can contact you.  Many bands will give away free stuff, like CDs.  Sometimes, they'll even put albums on their sites for download for free for limited periods. By following closely, you'll be there when it happens.  It's their way of rewarding loyal fans like you. Best way I know, because you also give something back to the bands in question.
